name: Light My Way
description:
This is an ArtCenter Game Jam Project. 

The Theme is Through the Darkness. 

The name of the project is Light My Way. It's a story of a cute little dust ball called Dustie, getting back to the land of brightness. Dustie is the soul of nearly dead human. It's now wandering in a dark land between life and death. Player is the guider of Dustie, trying to lead it return to bright. 

Background Story: 

Covid-19 took many lives. We believe that people will burst out with a very strong will to live before they die. 

Dustie is a will of a dying people. 

You are the guider in this area between life and death. 

Please lead Dustie getting back to its human body.

Game Mechanic: 

It's a 2D Platformer puzzle game. Player control Dustie moving lift / right and jump. Also, the key feature is putting the power-up lights into the level, giving Dustie some special abilities. 

Yellow Light allow Dustie climbing all shapes of wall. 

Red Light allow Dustie shooting his stings. 

Control System:

A & D - moving left and right. 

Space - Jump

Q & E - Shooting stings. Q to the left and E to the right. 

Z - Undo the action 

R - Restart the Level. 

Please Enjoy!
